external.gw.api.bean.compare.ui

Interface DiffDisplay

  • Deprecated. 
    External entities are deprecated. Please use the new Java API instead.

    @Deprecated
public interface DiffDisplay
    Represents a policy difference as it appears in the policy refresh comparison screen. It provides everything necessary to display the difference. Operations on a DiffDisplay are not recursive, for example #getType() does not examine their children.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getLabel()
      Deprecated. 
      the displayable value for the Diff being displayed.
      java.lang.String getNewValue()
      Deprecated. 
      the new Policy value for the Diff being displayed.
      java.lang.String getOldValue()
      Deprecated. 
      the old Policy value for the Diff being displayed.
